templates.value: [[WholeJSON.name]] is an [[WholeJSON.nationality]] [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){actress}else{actor}]] who was born in [[WholeJSON.birthplace]] in [[asString(WholeJSON.birthyear)]].

[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] [[chooseAtRandom('appeared','acted')]] in [[numToWords(len(movie2000))]] [[countable(len(ActorMovies), '', chooseAtRandom('movie','film'))]] and won [[if(numToWords(len(awards2000))=='zero'){no}]]  AcademyAwards.Her career took off in the 2000s. 

[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] [[chooseAtRandom('appeared','acted')]] in [[numToWords(len(movie2010))]] [[countable(len(ActorMovies), '', chooseAtRandom('movie','film'))]] and won [[if(numToWords(len(awards2010))=='zero'){no}]] AcademyAward.Her career continued at a similar pace in the 2010s.



[[WholeJSON.shortname]] appeared in twenty movies and won one Academy Award.

[[WholeJSON.shortname]] started [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){her}else{his}]] career as [[first_movie[0].role]] in the movie [[if(len(first_movie)==2){"[[first_movie[0].name]]" and "[[first_movie[1].name]]" }else{"[[first_movie[0].name]]"}]] in the year [[formatNumber(minVal(map(ActorMovies, x->(x.year))),"####")]]. [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] [[chooseAtRandom('appeared','acted')]] in [[countable(len(ActorMovies), '', chooseAtRandom('movie','film'))]] [[if(len(TotalAwards)==0){but} else{and}]] [[if(len(TotalAwards)==0){did not win any academy award}elseif(len(TotalAwards)==1){won [[len(TotalAwards)]] academy award}else{won [[len(TotalAwards)]] academy awards}]]. [[if(len(Director)!=0){[[WholeJSON.shortname]] also directed [[len(Director)]] movies [[if(len(DirectorAwards)==0){but} else{and}]] won [[if(len(DirectorAwards)==0){no}else[[len(DirectorAwards)]]]] awards.}else{.}]] [[if(len(producer)!=0){ Through out [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){her}else{his}]] career [[WholeJSON.shortname]] produced [[len(producer)]] movies including [[if(len(producer)==1){"[[producer[0].name]]".}else{"[[producer[0].name]]","[[producer[1].name]]",etc.}]] }else{.}]] One of the best movie by [[WholeJSON.shortname]] is "[[best_movie[0].name]]" with the total rating of [[best_movie[0].rating]].

[[CareerSummary]]

#define AwardCount(movieList)[[// return the number of Acting Academy awards in a movie list
BestActorAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Actor'));
BestActressAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Actress'));
BestSupportingActorAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Supporting Actor'));
BestSupportingActressAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Supporting Actress'));
BestActorAwardCount+BestActressAwardCount+BestSupportingActorAwardCount+BestSupportingActressAwardCount
]]

#define DecadeSummary(decadeStart)

[[chooseAtRandom("[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] [[chooseAtRandom('appeared','acted')]] in [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)),'',chooseAtRandom('movie','film'))]] in the [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]s., [[if(MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))==0){[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] was not nominated}else{[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){She}else{He}]] was nominated for [[MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))]] [[if(MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))==0)[[chooseAtRandom('movie','film')]]elseif(MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))==1)[[chooseAtRandom('movie','film')]]else[[chooseAtRandom('movies','films')]]]]}]] and [[if(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart))==0){did not win any academy award.}elseif(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart))==1){won one academy award.}else{ won [[countable(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart)),'','')]] academy awards.}]]",

"In the decade [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]'s, [[WholeJSON.shortname]] did [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)),'',chooseAtRandom('movie','film'))]] [[if(MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))==0){with no nomination}elseif(MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))==1){with one nomination}else{ with [[MovieCount(Count_nomination(decadeStart))]] nominations}]] and [[if(len(Count_award(decadeStart))==0){no}else[[countable(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart)),'','')]]]] [[if(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart))==0){award}elseif(MovieCount(Count_award(decadeStart))==1){award}else{awards}]].")]] [[comparison(decadeStart)]]

#define YearFormat(year)[[// return a year in usual format
formatNumber(year,'####')]]

#define MovieCount(movieList)[[// return the number of movies in a list of movies
len(movieList)]]

#define DecadeMovies(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ActorMovies,movie->(movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define Count_award(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ActorMovies,movie->(movie.award!=null&&movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define Count_nomination(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ActorMovies,movie->((len(movie.nominations)!= 0)&&movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define comparison(decadeStart)

[[if(len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))>len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))){In this decade [[WholeJSON.shortname]]'s career [[chooseAtRandom('grew','hiked','improved')]] [[if(len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))-len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))>=5){at an excellent pace by acting in [[len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)) - len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))]] more movies than the last decade}elseif(len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))-len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))<=2){compared to the last decade}else{at a good pace}]]}elseif(len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))<len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))){[[if((len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))-len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)))>=3){[[chooseAtRandom("there was drop in [[WholeJSON.name]]'s career in this decade.","In comparison with last decade acting career droped in [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]'s.")]]}else{there was no significant change in the career compared to previous decade}]]}else{career was constant for [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='female'){her}else{him}]] during [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]'s.}]] [[if(len(DirectorMovies(decadeStart-10))>=len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart-10))){.}else{[[if(len(DirectorMovies(decadeStart))>=len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))){Career mainly shifted from Acting to Directing.}elseif(len(ProducerMovies(decadeStart))>=len(DecadeMovies(decadeStart))){Career mainly shifted from Acting to producing movies in [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]'s.}else{.}]]}]]

#define DirectorMovies(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(Director,movie->(movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define ProducerMovies(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(producer,movie->(movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]
